comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: P-47C serial 41-6257 had started its career assigned to the 63rd Fighter Squadron, 56th FG. LT Vance P. Ludwig made a belly landing in her on 13 February 1943. Following repairs she was transferred to HQ 65th Fighter Wing at Atcham, her luck ran out again on 19 April. Flight Officer Conrad C. Ingold suffered an engine failure and he made this forced landing two miles southwest of the field.
